text: to complete the exact inventory of all our travelling accompaniments , i must not forget a pocket medicine chest , containing blunt scissors , splints for broken limbs , a piece of tape of unbleached linen , bandages and compresses , lint , a lancet for bleeding , all dreadful articles to take with one . then there was a row of phials containing dextrine , alcoholic ether , liquid acetate of lead , vinegar , and ammonia drugs which afforded me no comfort . finally , all the articles needful to supply ruhmkorff 's apparatus .
